name: aspear-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder is frozen, it consumes this item to thaw itself. Used on a party Pokémon : Cures freezing.
short_effect: Held: Consumed when frozen to cure frozen.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A hold item that defrosts POKéMON in battle.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that defrosts POKéMON in battle.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: When held by a POKéMON, it will be used in battle for defrosting.
